Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can Passport Canada revoke a child's passport and deny parents' passport services based on misuse?
Crimes.Outcome: Application dismissed, costs awarded to Passport Canada
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Canadian Passport Order - revocation and denial of services for abuse or misuse
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misuse of child's passport by an imposter due to parental negligence
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to report passport lost or stolen, insufficient explanations
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to report loss or theft, inadequate justification
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness and lawfulness under Canadian administrative law
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Revocation of child's passport and five-year denial of services
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Lawfulness and reasonableness of revocation and service denial
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Parental negligence leading to passport misuse
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to report loss or theft

Crimes.Crime_Name: Possession of a passport knowing it has been unlawfully used
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can Passport Canada revoke a child's passport and deny parents' passport services for misuse?
Crimes.Outcome: Application dismissed, costs awarded to Passport Canada ($2,000)
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Canadian Passport Order - revocation and denial of services for abuse or misuse
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misuse of child's passport by an imposter due to parental negligence
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to report passport lost or stolen, insufficient explanations
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to report loss or theft, inadequate justification
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness and lawfulness under Canadian administrative law
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Revocation of child's passport and five-year denial of services

Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Parental negligence leading to passport misuse

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to report loss or theft of a passport
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can Passport Canada revoke a child's passport and deny parents' passport services for failure to report loss or theft?
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Revocation of passport and denial of services upheld
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Duty to report lost or stolen passports under Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Failure to report passport loss/theft enabling misuse
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Timing of misuse, lack of reporting, explanations provided
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Challenge to revocation and service denial
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Passport Canada defended its decision as lawful and reasonable
Crimes.Outcome: Application dismissed, costs awarded to Passport Canada
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Canadian Passport Order - duty to report loss/theft
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Parents applying on behalf of child
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Abuse of passport system due to failure to report
